root.name: Marmalade Boy
root.description: OverviewMarmalade Boy is a dating sim game that was released only in Japan and based on a popular anime of the same name. Marmalade Boy was originally released on the Game Boy system, and later released on the Super Famicom. In Marmalade Boy the player assumes the role of Miki. As Miki the player must try and win the affections of one of three characters: Yuu, Ginta, and Kei.
